title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 941/81 of 7 April 1981 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3011/79 fixing the coefficients for calculating levies on derived poultrymeat products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 941/81 of 7 April 1981 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3011/79 fixing the coefficients for calculating levies on derived poultrymeat products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 3011/79 is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 May 1981.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 April 1981.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 282, 1.11.1975, p. 77. (2) OJ No L 282, 1.11.1975, p. 84. (3) OJ No L 80, 26.3.1981, p. 1. (4) OJ No L 337, 29.12.1979, p. 65.
ANNEX
